different seasons. Different segments can be highlighted for each of the different

* GGplot is more adaptible, and flexible compared to circlize.
* it follows Grammer of grahics 


## Running Code

```{r preparation}
library(tidyverse) # libs
source("../data/exercise1_load_data.r") # load data

```

```{r}
sleep_data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = count, y = wake_time))+
  geom_area(mapping=aes(x=count, y=daylight_length_h/2.4))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_hline(yintercept=8)+
  geom_vline(xintercept=0)+
  coord_polar(start=pi, direction=-1)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=count, y=24-sleep_time))


```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
